message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to show you our premium product! It's a unique and valuable item that I think you'll really appreciate.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. $15000 is a bit higher than I'm comfortable paying right now. I'm willing to pay $10000 for the product. Let me know what you think.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand that 10000 is a bit low for me, but I'm willing to compromise. I can offer you the product for 13000. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really appreciate the value it brings.
Alice, I appreciate you meeting me halfway. I'm still hoping to get closer to my target price. I'm willing to pay $11000 for the product. Let's see if we can make this work.

I understand that you're trying to get closer to your target price, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway again. I can offer you the product for 12500. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really appreciate the value it brings.
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate.  I'm still hoping to find a price that works for both of us. I'm willing to pay $11500 for the product.  Let's see if we can come to an agreement.

I'm getting close to accepting your offer, Bob. I can see that you're willing to meet me halfway again. I'm willing to make one more concession. I can offer you the product for 12200. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really appreciate the value it brings.
Alice, I appreciate your persistence. I'm still hoping to find a price that works for both of us. I'm willing to pay $11800 for the product. This is my final offer.
I appreciate your final offer, Bob, but I'm still not willing to sell the product for 11800. I'm willing to make one more concession. I can offer you the product for 12000. This is my final offer.
